title: Ricotta and herb cappellacci
description: This beautifully summery dish makes delicious use of fragrant herbs, fresh cheese and seasonal vegetables.
ingredients: 400g/14oz ‘00’ pasta flour, plus extra for dusting
4 free-range eggs, mixed with 1-2 tbsp water as necessary
1 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan, plus extra to serve
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh basil leaves
1 tsp finely chopped fresh marjoram leaves
1 tsp finely chopped fresh oregano leaves
50g/1¾oz Parmesan, grated, plus extra to serve
100g/3½oz runner beans, trimmed, cut into 2cm/¾in lengths
salt and freshly ground black pepper
